title.rendered: Top 10 Reasons to Hire Angularjs Developers for Customer-Centric Business

content.rendered:
Those were gone years when businesses used to focus on selling products and services as much as possible to many customers. But in the 21st century, the scenario has completely changed as a product-centric marketing strategy is not working out anymore. And the companies are opting for a customer-centric business approach to overcome losses and increasing sales in this digital era. The customer-centric businesses focus on customers’ needs, uses of products and services, and less time, money, and effort cost for them.

AngularJS, which is a JavaScript framework is a dedicated tool for the front end development of web app and mobile app projects. In the race of businesses looking for a customer-centric business approach, AngularJS wins over other platforms for the web app and mobile app development. In case, you are willing to develop a web app or mobile app for your business. You can choose an ideal partner considering your project requirement whether hiring an AngularJS developer or outsource project from the top AngularJS development company. The choice is all yours.

Before describing the top reasons to hire AngularJS developers for your customer-centric business. It would be better to have a brief knowledge of AngularJS.

A Brief Introduction About AngularJS Development

Rolled out in the year 2010, AngularJS is a JavaScript framework that is used to simplify the development process. Since its launch, this platform has become popular among front-end developers for creating interactive web apps. Thanks to an easy integration of different HTML codes which simplifies the web and app development tasks and allows the creation of dynamic web applications.

AngularJS is an open-source development framework which allows web developers to tackle a wide range of challenges that occur during web app development. Such quality of the platform makes it practically unavoidable for front end development.

Primarily, this JavaScript framework is responsible for developing CRUD applications for the client-side.

In addition to this, this framework can be utilized by top AngularJS development companies for the development of feature-rich, robust web apps that can easily fulfil the unique requirements of the client. As mentioned above, if you compare this platform with others in regards with front end development, it will win as it offers outstanding features and functionalities which makes it app developers’ first choice over others.

If you have never given it a chance for any web or app project, it’s worth having a closer look at the benefits (reasons) for considering it for your next project.

Reasons to Hire AngularJS Developers for Web App Development

These are the following reasons which advocate choosing AngularJS or hiring AngularJS developers for web app development. Have a look.

1. Interactive User Interface in AngularJS Development

With AngularJS, it became easier to develop a highly interactive user interface since it comes featured with several customizable components. Also, the framework supports developers in building lightweight and user-friendly web apps.

AngularJS relies on HTML to define codes required for creating appealing users’ interfaces. Due to which developers do not need to make extra efforts in writing codes. Also, writing code in HTML is quite easier as compared to coding in JS that neglects complexity issues between codes to a greater extent. You can check here how to hire UI/UX designer.

These are the qualities of AngularJS which makes it a capable contestant for creating interactive, lightweight, fully-functional, and user-friendly web apps. If you are looking to develop web apps with highly interactive UI design, you may consider hiring AngularJS developers or top AngularJS development company for your customer-centric business project.

2. Two-way Data Binding in AngularJS Development

Two-way data binding is one of the most popular features of AngularJS. Due to this feature, it became easier for developers to make into the app interface. Since if they would make any changes to the user interface it will automatically reflect in the app interface and vice versa.

In addition to this, the developers get coding leverage with this feature and save a lot of time as the platform’s two-way data binding facility allows rendering of changes made to the user interface directly in the app interface. That is why AngularJS is one of the noted frameworks for web app development in the current technological world.

3. High in Performance

AngularJS is renowned for developing feature-rich, fully-functional web apps. The framework also has a name for its capability of rapid development. Thanks to its some of the most unique and powerful features like filters, directives, data binding, form validation, routing and others which makes it possible to develop robust and scalable web apps within a shorter period.

Other than this, there are other aspects as well which makes it a framework high in performance in terms of development. These are IDEs and Common Line Interface (CLI). The AngularJS IDEs are way better than any other JS framework and it allows expert developers to track down errors immediately. While with the Common Line Interface, it became easier for developers to create web apps and attach components faster, which encourages speedy web app development.

4. Large Community Support

Tech giant, Google offers, AngularJS has a vast developers’ community, who are always ready to help each in case of need. This community is deliberately active resolving issues related to AngularJS web app development as soon as possible. There are experts in the community who have years of experience and have developed the capability to resolve even the most complex problems associated with front-end development. This group of developers remains always ready to help others in finding answers and solutions to their queries.

5. MVC and MVVM Architecture Integration

AngularJS uses MVC architecture, that means web apps can be split in MVC architecture. Such separation of web apps allows developers to save time and meet deadlines faster and project delivery on time.

 

Other than this, there is an integration ease of MVC (the model-view-controller architecture) and MVVM (model-view-view-model) architecture. As mentioned above, using this framework, it is easier to split apps into three sections. From the three sections, the one part is used for data management, other for data view and the third and last one for forming a bridge between the model and view.

6. AngularJS Development Supports Code Reusability

Code reusability is one of the most amazing features of AngularJS. It allows developers to reuse the code that has already been written without any hassle. Due to which, developers escaped doing extra work and saved a lot of time. Consequently, the web app development project meets deadlines faster and delivered on time.

Not even this, with this code reusability feature, it became easier to customize applications rapidly. Since there is a need for minor changes in the code and the web app updated with new features or functionality. While hiring dedicated AngularJS developers ensures the project delivery in the least possible time.

7. Testing in AngularJS Development

Testing is one of the success defining factors for any software development program. And the web app testing from the dedicated AngularJS developers responsible for development ensures a glitch-free app. Since it became easier for them to find errors and code defects. Consequently, the time to complete the project reduces to a greater extent.

8. Easy to Use

AngularJS is an easy to use framework for web app development. Since it requires less coding as compared to other JS frameworks available. Consequently, the input time and efforts from an expert reduces to a great extent. Besides this, the use of MVC architecture for web app development resists experts to not use getter and setter functions to apply data models.

9. Filters in AngularJS Development

When it comes to organizing stored data, filters play a vital role in any development process. AngularJS also provides different filters including Uppercase, Lowercase, Number, OrderBy and others. Filters come up as a true companion when it comes to showcasing large amounts of data to the user or you need creating database search functionality.

10. SPA features

AngularJS offers a plethora of SPA (Single Page Application) features. This SPA features help in creating and controlling online forms in a much easier way. Using these features one can complete the workflow of the team and once it is done, it becomes easier to accomplish web app development goals. In addition to this, developers get control over the form of validation abilities.

Conclusion

The demand for front-end development services is quite high in the market and AngularJS is one of the most preferred front-end technologies for the development of interactive, engaging and robust web apps. Besides this, the platform enables any top AngularJS development company to develop innovative and customer-centric business apps for their clients investing less effort, time and money. Other than this, above mentioned are some of the top reasons which advocate selection of AngularJS and hiring AngularJS developers for developing websites and mobile apps which can attract more and more users and increase user engagement for your products and services.

If you still did not opt AngularJS for any of your web development projects, it is the time as the framework is becoming one of the top choices of established businesses, start-ups and entrepreneurs for developing successful web apps.
